terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks
Class SecondBlocks

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks.SecondBlocks
public class SecondBlocks
extends java.lang.Object

These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "second person manipulation".

Because these building blocks are rather specific in purpose they are included here as utilities instead of as general purpose building block classes in the framework core.

Nested Class Summary
static class SecondBlocks.FloorTarget
          Wraps a target object for sliding, rotating, and lifting it inside a room with an X-Z floor plane.
static class SecondBlocks.Room
          Constructs a room with lighting, an X-Z floor plane, and a defined size for limiting the movement of its contents.

Method Detail

buildPerfectFloorTarget

public static final MultiShape buildPerfectFloorTarget(javax.media.j3d.Node target,
                                                       AffineGroup slide,
                                                       AffineGroup rotate,
                                                       AffineGroup lift,
                                                       javax.vecmath.Point3d min,
                                                       javax.vecmath.Point3d max,
                                                       ViewChangeSplitter viewSpltr,
                                                       AppWorld world,
                                                       AppView view)
Creates a set of MultiShape feedback decorations for a target object that is intended to be slid, rotated, and lifted over an X-Z floor plane. The decorations include tooltips, handles, sound, outline, and skirt. Visualization techniques are used for the decorations as is appropriate. Also computes the target bounds and centers the target with its origin at the bottom. For the visualization to work use ChangePoster to post node changes (POST_NODE_EXTERNAL) with the returned object as the trigger.

Parameters:
target - Target object to be centered, offset, and decorated. If the target is a FeedbackTarget it will also be connected as a feedback target.
slide - Affine group used to slide the target. The group will be connected into an internal group chain and therefore should be supplied as new. Null if none.
rotate - Affine group used to rotate the target. The group will be connected into an internal group chain and therefore should be supplied as new. Null if none.
lift - Affine group used to slide the target. The group will be connected into an internal target chain and therefore should be supplied as new. Null if none.
min - Return copy of the centered target's bounding box minimum extent. Never null.
max - Return copy of the centered target's bounding box maximum extent. Never null.
viewSpltr - Source for view state changes. Never null.
world - Host environment for computing the target bounds. Never null.
view - Host environment for the sound audio device. If null then no sound.
Returns:
New MultiShape proxy target.
